Comment: TL;DR  Florida's largest Medicaid contractor, Centene, had overbilled taxpayers more than $67 million for medications. When they were caught, they were told to give the money back to the Florida government. At this point, Ol' Ronnie here said to divert $10 million to 2 charities (one is run by his wife). The scandal begins when neither of the 2 charities are required to report how they spend their money...and then it was found that the 2 charities donated $8.5 million donation to Ron's Super-PAC.  Looks like Ron's looking to run for POTUS again.
